questions.question_text: Which port type is used in a stacked deployment?

choices.C: between the control layer and application layer
choices.D: between the application layer and the infrastructure layer A
choices.B: between the collocated layer and the dislocated layer
choices.A: between the control layer and the infrastructure layer

questions.question_text: In the Software-Defined Networking model, where is the interface between the control plane and the data plane?

discussion.content:
Perhaps the answer is C: 
A northbound interface is defined as the connection between the controller and applications, whereas the southbound interface is the connection between the controller and the physical networking hardware. Because SDN is a virtualized architecture, these elements do not have to be physically located in the same place.

https://www.sdxcentral.com/networking/sdn/definitions/inside-sdn-architecture/

choices.A: The virtual IP address and virtual MAC address are active on the HSRP Master router.
choices.E: The HSRP virtual IP address must be the same as one of the router’s interface addresses on the LAN.
choices.D: The HSRP virtual IP address must be on a different subnet than the routers’ interfaces on the same LAN.
choices.B: The HSRP default timers are a 3 second hello interval and a 10 second dead interval.
choices.F: HSRP supports up to 255 groups per interface, enabling an administrative form of load balancing.

questions.question_text:
Place the Spanning-Tree Protocol port state on its functions (not all options on the left are used)
Select and Place:

discussion.content:
+ Populating the MAC address table but not forwarding data frames: LEARNING
+ Sending and receiving data frames: FORWARDING
+ Preparing to forward data frames without populating the MAC address table: LISTENING
+ Preventing the use of looped paths: BLOCKING

questions.answer_description:
+ Populating the MAC address table but not forwarding data frames: LEARNING
+ Sending and receiving data frames: FORWARDING
+ Preparing to forward data frames without populating the MAC address table: LISTENING
+ Preventing the use of looped paths: BLOCKING
